metadata.feature_description: Configure whether content requires approval before publication for Answers, Discussions, Ideas, and Social Events modules.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable content moderation for Answers module

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > Community Settings panel
steps.expected: Community Settings panel opens with Content Moderation section visible
steps.actual: Community Settings panel opened successfully with Content Moderation section showing Answers, Discussions, Ideas, and Social Events checkboxes

steps.action: Check the Answers checkbox under Content Moderation

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable content moderation for Answers module

steps.action: Uncheck the Answers checkbox under Content Moderation

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable content moderation for Discussions module

steps.action: Check the Discussions checkbox under Content Moderation

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable content moderation for Discussions module

steps.action: Uncheck the Discussions checkbox under Content Moderation

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable content moderation for Ideas module

steps.action: Check the Ideas checkbox under Content Moderation

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable content moderation for Ideas module

steps.action: Uncheck the Ideas checkbox under Content Moderation

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable content moderation for Social Events module

steps.action: Check the Social Events checkbox under Content Moderation
steps.actual: Social Events checkbox was successfully checked

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable content moderation for Social Events module

steps.action: Uncheck the Social Events checkbox under Content Moderation
steps.actual: Social Events checkbox was successfully unchecked

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Save all moderation settings and verify persistence

steps.action: Modify Content Moderation settings (uncheck Discussions) and click Save button
steps.expected: Settings save successfully with confirmation message
steps.actual: Save button clicked and 'Item successfully saved.' confirmation message appeared

steps.action: Refresh page and navigate back to Community Settings
steps.expected: Settings persist after page refresh - Discussions should remain unchecked
steps.actual: After page refresh, Discussions checkbox remained unchecked, confirming persistence

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify default values (all true) for new installations

steps.action: Verify all Content Moderation checkboxes are checked by default
steps.expected: Answers, Discussions, Ideas, and Social Events should all be checked by default
steps.actual: All four Content Moderation checkboxes (Answers, Discussions, Ideas, Social Events) are checked in the default state

observations: The Content Moderation settings are located under Settings > Community in the PersonaBar
The UI displays checkboxes for four modules: Answers, Discussions, Ideas, and Social Events
Changes to checkboxes are not saved until the Save button is clicked
A success notification 'Item successfully saved.' appears after saving
Settings persist correctly after page refresh, confirming proper database storage
The feature uses CmxSettingsController for backend settings management
